Posted By: Scott T
I am looking for the following T206 cards in SGC 10 (or better) for my bottom up, low grade T206 collection.  I will offer $200.00 per card via Paypal.

Bill Dahlen – Brooklyn
Kid Elberfeld – Portrait (Washington)
Ed Foster
Willie Keeler – Portrait
Nap Lajoie – with bat


If you are looking to sell any of these cards, please let me know.  

Thanks

Scott
